heading: Today
text: Windy, with showers becoming rain, ending as snow showers late.
temperature: Upper 40s and 50s, falling west to east

heading: Friday Night
text: Snow showers north, up to an inch, ending. Partly cloudy south. Still windy.

heading: Saturday
temperature: Mid 20s to mid 30s, north to south

heading: Sunday
text: Scattered snow showers north, partly sunny south.
